data.description: Embodying the raw, wayward spirit of rock ‘n’ roll, the Kilburn portable active stereo speaker takes the unmistakable look and sound of Marshall, unplugs the chords, and takes the show on the road. Weighing in under 7 pounds, the Kilburn is a lightweight piece of vintage styled engineering. Setting the bar as one of the loudest speakers in its class, the Kilburn is a compact, stout-hearted hero with a well- balanced audio which boasts a clear midrange and extended highs for a sound that is both articulate and pronounced. The analogue knobs allow you to fine tune the controls to your personal preferences while the guitar-influenced leather strap enables easy and stylish travel.

data.name: A Clock
data.introduce: Rubber wood table is a smart product that helps people use laptops most comfortably and easily. You can use it in the salon, in bed, on the floor to create the most comfortable and inspiring work experience without having to be forced to sit at the desk.
data.description: Fashionable and beautiful design with sturdy natural rubber wood material, high durability, shiny PU paint, easy to clean, Suitable table size to ensure compactness while ensuring usable area. comfortable.You can flexibly change the viewing angle to better suit your different sitting positions. In particular, the price is also designed with a lot of heat dissipation holes to help use the laptop for a long time without worrying about getting hot.

data.name: Mystery Box
data.introduce: This bookshelf has a modern, sophisticated yet powerful design. With the 2cm-thick outer gable, giving this wooden bookshelf an extremely sturdy frame with excellent bearing capacity, you won't need to worry about filling up books here.
data.description: This wooden shelf is very suitable for rooms with modest area because this bookshelf does not take up much space at all. Compact size but you can still put a lot of things, you can turn it into a mini library with your favorite books or use it as a display of decorations...This wooden bookshelf is made with 2 basic colors: natural wood color and cockroach wing color. The natural wood color bookshelf will make the room space bright and full of modernity, the varnished bookshelf is a traditional color that brings warmth and friendliness. Each color has its own beauty, the choice of which color is appropriate depends on the design of each space.
